properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, ADDRESS, PHONE, BIRTH) VALUES (SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT RPAD(SUBSTR(MEMBER_ID, 1, 4), LENGTH(MEMBER_ID), '*') "MEMBER_ID" FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND EMAIL = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND EMAIL = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NAME = ? , EMAIL = ? , ADDRESS = ? , PHONE = ? , BIRTH = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
SELECT ZZIM_NO,ZZIM_TNO,T_TITLE FROM ZZIM Z JOIN T_BOARD ON (ZZIM_TNO = T_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (ZZIM_MEMBER = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE Z.STATUS ='Y' AND ZZIM_MEMBER = ? ORDER BY Z.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT Z.ZZIM_NO, Z.ZZIM_MEMBER, Z.ZZIM_TNO, T.T_TITLE FROM ZZIM Z, T_BOARD T WHERE Z.ZZIM_MEMBER = ? AND Z.ZZIM_TNO = T.T_NO(+) AND Z.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY Z.CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT T_NO, T_TITLE, T_PRICE, CREATE_DATE, STATUS FROM T_BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY T_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM ZZIM WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND ZZIM_MEMBER = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM T_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT T_NO,T_TITLE, T_PRICE,CATEGORY_NO, CREATE_DATE, T_COUNT, MEMBER_NO, B.STATUS FROM T_BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
